message.body: Hey Kurt, I hate to do this so last minute but I need to cancel for today, my friend is getting here at 11am and I'm afraid I won't be back in time. I can do it tomorrow as my guest is leaving late tonight. I could still do it today if it is pretty close but it seemed like it was more than 45 minutes away
That's fine. I have to call the guy at 8am to arrange a plan. I'll let you know where it stands.
Well it looks like we could possibly make it in time but it's too close for comfort. Tomorrow would be better
What time tomorrow is good for you?
But getting it over with in the morning would be nice
Alright. Around this time. Let you know in about a half hour.
This guy says he won't be around until 1pm tomorrow. Middle of the day. Kinda sucks. Let me know.
